string.value: #b#p20002##k in #b#m60000##k looks upset. What's going on?

#p20002# heard that somebody says he looks like a #o1210100#. That's why he's so mad. To be honest, he does sort of look like aâ€¦ Anyway, for #p20002#'s sake, you should defeat #r2#o1210100##k. \n #k \n#o1210100# #r#a10231# #k
Argh! I've had it up to here! I can't stand it! Someone is spreading rumors that I look like a #o1210100#! What an insult! I need your help!

Clear out all the #o1210100#s around #m60000#! If all the #o1210100#s disappear, so will the rumor. What? There are too many #o1210100#s? Oh, come on. Fine, just kill #r2 #o1210100#s#k. You can handle that, can't you?
You don't want to help me? Are you saying I look like a #o1210100#?!
Yes! You killed two #o1210100#s! Wonderful! Thank you so, so much! That rumor should go away now.
You saved my life. If I ever find out who spread that rumor, he's a dead man.
You still have #rtwo#o1210100#s#k to defeat. You can do it if you're willing to. Please try! My reputation is at stake!
